Package fr.xephi.authme.events

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTeleportEvent
    Common supertype for all AuthMe teleport events.
    AbstractUnregisterEvent
    Event fired when a player has been unregistered.
    AuthMeAsyncPreLoginEvent
    This event is called when a player uses the login command, it's fired even when a user does a /login with invalid password.
    AuthMeAsyncPreRegisterEvent
    This event is called when a player uses the register command, it's fired even when a user does a /register with invalid arguments.
    AuthMeTeleportEvent
    This event is fired before AuthMe teleports a player for general purposes.
    CustomEvent
    The parent of all AuthMe events.
    EmailChangedEvent
    This event is called when a player adds or changes his email address.
    FailedLoginEvent
    Event fired when a player enters a wrong password.
    FirstSpawnTeleportEvent
    Event that is called if a player is teleported to the AuthMe first spawn, i.e.
    LoginEvent
    Event fired when a player has successfully logged in or registered.
    LogoutEvent
    This event is called when a player logs out through AuthMe, i.e.
    PasswordEncryptionEvent
    This event is called when we need to compare or hash a password for a player and allows third-party listeners to change the encryption method.
    ProtectInventoryEvent
    This event is called before the inventory data of a player is suppressed, i.e.
    RegisterEvent
    Event fired when a player has successfully registered.
    RestoreInventoryEvent
    This event is fired when the inventory of a player is restored (the inventory data is no longer hidden from the user).
    RestoreSessionEvent
    Event fired before a session is restored.
    SpawnTeleportEvent
    Called if a player is teleported to a specific spawn upon joining or logging in.
    UnregisterByAdminEvent
    Event fired after a player has been unregistered from an external source (by an admin or via the API).
    UnregisterByPlayerEvent
    Event fired after a player has unregistered himself.
